name: Tanis Hart
text: Loved working here.....but as of 10pm, 01/13/2020 this location has shut down permanently. Thanks to everyone that made it a great place!

name: Clay Birch
text: Had a pretty big problem with hold times a few weeks ago. The manager kindly fixed the problem and things were fine. I called to place and order today to find that they have opted to use call centers to answer the overflow calls now. â€¦More

name: Darren Anderson
text: Great customer service. Every time we are there the staff are always very kind and helpful.

name: Richard Garber
text: Food was hot and food was GREAT! The staff at the Tanque Verde location are super nice and fun to talk to. See y'all soon. Thanks

name: Larry Arrington
text: Manager was super nice and treated customers well. So many places you go, they take care of your order and then send you on your way. She made you feel like somebody and not just" the next person in line".

name: stlouisrams00
text: Love getting a beer while waiting for my pizza order. It acts as motivation to pick up my pizza instead of having it delivered. Spend money on a delivery charge or get a beer? Beer. Every time.

name: Jeremiah Johnson
text: Always helped out my football team and other teams with great pizza deals. They support athletics in Tucson.

name: Chris Gebhardt
text: Best pizza hut we have visited.  Friendly staff.

name: Suzanne Gumaskas
text: Was the worst pizza ever .Crust not cooked all the way. Sauce was terrible like plain canned tomatoes

name: Jennett Swan
text: This is strictly for the Speedway/Kolb take-out location. I've tried to get past the fact that they have a high turnover rate as a contributor to the poor service. Enough is enough! I go to either Golf Links/Harrison, or Tanque Verde/Bear Canyon now.

name: Stacy Fillerup
text: Sadie is the best.  Not thinking I put in a big order for pick up to take up Mount Lemmon for a bunch of girls at camp.  She made it happen personally and I was able to get lunch to the girls on time.  So glad for hard work and the pizza was a hit!!!  Thanks!

name: Eli Mead
text: This is a great Pizza Hut location. The pizzas always come out looking great, service is nice. Delivery has been fast and easy with online orders. No complaints. Pizza Hut isn't always the best choice for pizza given the price but I do consider it one of my favorite chains, it's delicious.

name: Kelly Green
text: Called for delivery and they were very-nice on phone my pizza came sooner then expected and delivery guy was super friendly and nice . I would order from here again. Pizza was very good too. Hand tossed supreme very good

name: Donald Kirk Juren
text:
I ordered on line . Got home ready to enjoy my Pie , hell no what happened to the CHEESE!
WHERE ARE THE PEOPLE FROM NO CHEESE. â€¦More

name: James Baskin
text: Keep an eye out for specials on their delicious pizzas

name: Mindy Gonzales
text: Excellent Pizza, actually best thin crust pizza we've ever had! Service at this pizza Hut is always great, from the person who takes our order to the friendly, not scary delivery people!lol  only thing we might not order again would be the â€¦More

name: tommy colton
text: The driver tommy is the sweetest nicest person ive ever meet

name: Jimmy Smith
text: Great wings, even better pizza. From my experience it is not crowded. Perfect place to grab pizzas for parties.

name: John Glenn
text: Awesome staff and great food as always....

name: Stephanie Paige Wellington
text: Ordered the tasty treat box with two medium pizzas, breadsticks, and the brownie. It was delivered within 30 minutes and came in an adorable picnic basket box and everything I ordered was delicious. Plenty of the hut favorite seasoning was â€¦More

name: Mark Fulcher
text: Enjoyed great wings and pizza. Courteous staff.

name: Pam Mcfarlin
text: Loved my pizza! Go Fri and Saturdays, pizzas always perfect!! Thank you

name: Joey Findysz
text: I ordered normal pizza with sauce online and the pizza that came had their, "cheesy parmesan sauce". We called to see if they could do anything and they couldn't because we ordered online, then they tried to sell us another pizza. Never ordering from Pizza Hut again, they will mess up your order.

name: Bill Roe
text: Service is very slow never comes back to check with you

name: Jess Simpson
text: $15 for a lg pepperoni pizza? Should have gone to little caesars! Could have had 3! Taste the same too!

name: Jess E
text: Great atmosphere, kids corner is an awesome addition. Customer service was good and pizza is tasty! Highly recommend this location.

name: Holly Hufstetler
text: This used to be a great pizza hut.  Now, it is really going downhill. My last two delivery experiences have been bad.  I have had to call multiple times (3 times once, then 2 times this time) to get my order in. Then this time they gave me â€¦More

name: Allen Lewis
text: Good food and service

name: Floyd Graves
text: Staff is great every time I dine in, my pick up orders are always correct and ready at the specified time.  For dine in they have a great place for families with small children, with entertainment on tv, that is age specific.

name: Roise Tosie
text: Ordered wings with my pizza .....disappointing to say the least.....big black box and maybe 4 wings .....is that what my money paid for ??  ðŸ˜’

name: Vincent Mccormick
text: Pretty clean and not very busy at around noon on a Saturday. Gabby was our server, she took our entire order with special pizzas without writing them and got them correct. She was very friendly and patient with my family for being very indecisive lol. Over all great experience.

name: Jessica Maxam
text: Always a great deal online!

name: Jean-Leonard Casseus
text: Great customer service

name: Tabitha
text: Employees go above and beyond here. Went thru the drive thru and my order wasn't done since I was early so I drove around and parked. Employee brought my meal to the car. Foods tasty, sign up online and list this one as your favorite location. I get emails each week with savings. So awesome

name: GD Leong
text: After ordering 2 pizzas and some wings from a very friendly cashier, I waited 15 min and received my food (nothing fancy, just hot and good.)   I felt it was a good value at $25.   The restaurant was clean and kid friendly.

name: guy smith
text: They sell a great product, Their business is clean and affordable. The staff is friendly.

name: Joseph Gallagher
text: Great food and great times!

name: Brenda Hernandez
text: Ordered pizza and was supposed to be ready in 15 minutes. Sat in the drive thru  for  another 30 minutes  manager tried to blame it on graduation night. You would think they would have enough staff. But the delivery drivers were getting â€¦More

name: Johnny Dionne
text: Love this pizza hut!!

name: casey forrey
text: Was suppose to have are pizzas ready at 11:00 am so we could take them for a classroom of kindergarten kids and no one showed up till 11:10 am and they still needed to make the pizza. I received the pizza at no cost but that doesn't help the kids eat lunch on time so the teacher can keep the schedule

name: Shellie Whitman
text: Always love it here.

name: Roll Tide
text: Pizza cold.

name: Candice Lynn
text: Very clean

name: cesar gamez
text: Good

name: AKA_ ESSENCE
text: Best pizza hut in Tucson

name: Rebecca Arter
text: Average.

name: Destrey Ace
text: Extremely bad experience third trip recently and each time has gotten worse.

name: David Pruett
text: Not very clean

name: Tucson Dad
text: Great pizza and wings, we love it here!

name: kim danielson
text: My go to place

name: Ron Osland
text: Great

name: Cheryl Ruff
text: Good service, clean location.

name: Samantha Kidd
text: Average
